resources.string: This view contains basic information about a device. You can also change the device´s state and append reports.
Use this view to find members of staff or devices associated with your hospital.
Please put a fresh barcode sticker on the device you want to register and scan it with your camera.
Please enter all general data known about the device.
Please take a snapshot of the device, so your colleagues can indentify it easily.
Please add a short description about what problems the device has and what you have done in order to solve them.
Always consider browsing through the reports in order to get more information about the device before planning your repair.
You can use this data to contact your colleagues or staff at other hospitals.
This is your very own user profile. You can add some general information like your telephone number and position here.

Barcode Scanner
The Scanner tab lets you scan registered barcodes and leads you directly to the respective device page. Alternatively you can enter the number of the ID sticker, if scanning is not possible.

TODO List
The TODO tab gives you an overview of all devices that are broken or up for maintenance. If a colleague is already working on a case, it will be displayed as in progress.

Search
The Search tab enables you to walk through the devices and users registered in the database.

In order to register a new user for your hospital please contact swift-app@teog.de

About TeoG Swift

TeoG Swift is an inventory and maintenance application, developed by the NGO Technik ohne Grenzen e.V. (Technology without borders) short TeoG. Its intended use is to have a central database of hospital devices in a certain area, in order to document their repairs and simplify the search for spare parts. The code can be downloaded and modified for your own needs at Github (https://github.com/TechnologyWithoutBorders/Swift-App) under the Apache 2.0 License (https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0).
